segments.text: Hello . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got some documents here that go with the L / C our company opened 10 days ago . I think there is something wrong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Have you checked everything carefully ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very carefully , that's when I found the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , I see . The goods description is totally different from what you are expecting , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep , you've got it ! What should we do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually , if the problem is insignificant I advise the customer to go ahead ; it's normally a translation problem or something like that . But this does seem a little more serious . I suggest you get back on to them right now and ask them about it . Hopefully you can sort it out over the phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a great idea ; thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
